rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with a modest reception area. Includes storage for shoes and coats.

An expansive living room that opens up to the veranda, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation. Incorporates Kerala-style woodwork and local motifs, ensuring a blend of aesthetics with modern functionality. Vastu principles ensure east-facing windows.
Adjacent to the living room, features a built-in dining area with minimalistic design suitable for family gatherings.
A compact yet functional kitchen with integrated storage and modern amenities. Designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind, ensuring ease of movement.
First bedroom with a spacious balcony for natural light and fresh air. Equipped with floor-to-ceiling windows, keeping local Kerala aesthetics in mind. Adaptable to wheelchair requirements.
Second bedroom featuring a private balcony. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample natural light and ventilation, designed for a peaceful retreat.
Dedicated living space for the staff, incorporating basic amenities while maintaining privacy. Designed to be simple and cost-effective.
